title: Aspirin Pain Reliever and Fever Reducer
description: Aspirin is used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation. It is also used to reduce the risk of heart attack and stroke.

title: Paracetamol Mild to Moderate Pain
description: Paracetamol is used to treat mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. It is commonly used for headaches, muscle aches, arthritis, backaches, toothaches, colds, and fevers.

title: Amoxicillin Antibiotic for Bacterial Infections
description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria.

title: Ibuprofen for Pain and Inflammation
description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that is used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation caused by many conditions such as headache, toothache, arthritis, menstrual cramps, or minor injury.

title: Metformin Diabetes Medicine for Blood Sugar
description: Metformin is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels. It is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

title: Atorvastatin Cholesterol and Triglyceride Reducer
description: Atorvastatin is used to lower cholesterol and triglycerides in the blood. It may reduce the risk of heart attack, stroke, and certain heart and blood vessel problems in people with certain conditions.
